name: Trick or Treat or Trick or Treat or Trick
name_original: Trick or Treat or Trick or Treat or Trick
description:
A parser game about candy and time loops, written in Inform 7 for EctoComp 2022's "petite mort" division in just under four hours.

There are a couple of tiny bugs but the game works and is winnable -- you just need to figure out what to do and when! Fortunately, you have lots of time... ;)

I'll patch with an update (and probably an in-game hint system) after EctoComp voting closes.

Cover image adapted from halloween candy by Terren in Virginia, used under a CC-BY license. I used MS Paint for that, uh, glorious 1990s feel. (Sorry.)
